short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your crypto currency wallets with a url!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share your crypto currency wallets with a url!

Bit Trail is a completely free extension to allow anyone host their wallet address on a easy to share url that can either be viewed on any browser or directly entered into the supporting wallets.

Bit Trail has been developed based on the wallet url standard as defined here:
https://github.com/poya-r/crypto-wallet-urls
